db.description:
1. Help maintain an international standard of service. 
2. Prepare and serve beverage orders. Know proper preparation and presentation of beverage. Serve guests promptly and politely to ensure guest satisfaction. 
3. Prepare requisition slips for supplies, following par stocks. Submit to Bar Supervisor for approval. 
4. Inform guests about any current and upcoming restaurant activities and promotions, outlet service hours, house rules and regulations, check presentation, and payment methods. 
5. Know and follow F&B Department standards of professional service, personal grooming, dress code, hygiene, and punctuality. 
6. Know all procedures, and help support Cashier section 
7. Complete all assigned side work, including rotating and restocking beverage storage areas and setting up and cleaning service stations. 
8. Receive F&B guest compliments, comments, and complaints. Refer all guest communications to F&B Supervisor on Duty. 
9. Ensure that the station or assigned area is ready for service on time 
10. Know and follow established company rules, regulations, and policies 
11. Minimize operating costs by conserving equipment, supplies, and utilities.
db.requirement: - Used to be working in F&B field more than 1 year. \r\n- Creative and flexible to make different cocktail. \r\n- Fast learning and love to be a best Bartender in future.
db.benefit: - Follow VN laws. \r\n- Working in international environment, friendly and teamwork. \r\n- Beside basic salary, extra bonus and tip monthly.
